I see the haters are out in full force again, your man won.. Let's see how you feel in 4 years. I think Obama tried to do a lot but was prevented by Republican gridlock and they're hatred of him because he is black.

My husband and I just spent a month in the USA, traveling the West coast. We would only order one meal to share as the portions were enormous, even then we had too much on our plates. All around us would be families with children, all consuming full plates of food.

You fools need to look up Germany, Denmark, Sweden, U.K., France, England. Do you know there are Muslim ghettos in this countries that police fear going into? That they complain about the locals walking their dogs, demand extra rights, use violence once the population reached a certain percent. You people defend Islam know nothing about what's going on in the rest of the world. Thank God we have a huge ocean dividing us for now.

Michael Moore you did it! Went to see your movie last night and it was moving, inspiring and enlightening. Amazing! i think it is your best work to date. Don't let these haters who cannot open their minds enough to see that being critical of your country is the only way to make it better. It is actually because you LOVE our country so much that you are trying to bring this into the light so we can fix it! Thank you for doing what you do. It is people like you that have helped make this country what it is today!
